segments.text: Were you able to attend Friday night's basketball game ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was unable to make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should have been there . It was intense .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that right . Who ended up winning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I was free that night . I'm kind of mad that I didn't go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was the score at the end of the game ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like it was a close game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the reason it was such a great game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The next game , I will definitely be there .
segments.speaker: S2
